ygData.subject: Xegony Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Brothers and Sisters of Song, I was contacted for a corpse loc in Lake Rathe last Saturday and unable to assist myself, I did /who all bard to see who was
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Brothers and Sisters of Song,

I was contacted for a corpse loc in Lake Rathe last Saturday and unable to
assist myself, I did /who all bard to see who was close. I found a young
bard named Atonal, L16 and just going to get the Ayre. He was a helpful
young man and so when the corpse recovery was called off due to the victim
getting rez'ed by a wandering cleric, we struck up a friendship. Many
lambent stones were poofing as there were no bards in the Mtns responding to
our shouts so he came out and picked one up. Btw bards on Xegony, if /who
all Brilinnia is in Rathe mtns, good chance lambents stones are going to
waste, feel free to ask to come pick one up.
Next day Xegony tops 100 players in LG and Atonal is not busy, so I explain
to him where to come to wait to loot shin greaves and gaunts. Next thing I
know, some of my L50ish guildmates have slipped him into the assassin room
where there were camping for TBB's and masks not wanted. He never got a mask
since it didn't respawn but they tried for over 12 hrs.
I advised him to join this list too. I really enjoy helping out lower level
players with advice and probably will pass down some of my old equipment
like elfhides. I don't like the trend in beggars so I am in and out of bank
zones fast. But I don't like the image of 'high levels' being aloof and too
busy to talk. I never go anony or RP, meaning I am willing to answer any
serious questions from anyone. Just ask me twice if I don't answer the first
time, spam being what it is in battle sometimes.


Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (Finally L39!)
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, Xegony server
